DESIGN A VEHICLE WITH ONE OR TWO MOUSE TRAP AS SOURCE
 ROUND 1:
 The vehicle has to cover the maximum possible distance in a time span of 10seconds. The path may be little rough. The distance that would be taken into consideration will depends on the position of the vehicle at the end of tenth second measured from starting point. 
ROUND 2:
 In this round mouse trap vehicle has to move forward and destroy the set off cup arranged in the path and return to the point behind the starting line as quickly as possible. Reversing and starting mechanism has to work automatically. The vehicle must destroy the set of plastic cups (provided by event organisers), placed in the path of 2mtr line and reverse its direction and should touch the starting point which is the minimum criteria in order to receive the ideal distance score and the one which reverse to the maximum distance will be the winner.
